none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 03, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
Hook riddled, laid back garage punk/power pop hybrid. The chilled out vocals are just kinda hanging out in the vicinity of the songs, with harmonies stopping by for a brief visit every verse or two. Kinda reminds me of DANGER LOVES, though these punks are a touch less poppy. I'm pretty sure this 2007 demo is all we got from NERVOUS WRECKS, before members went on to LIBYANS, SIAMESE TWINS and a host of others. Get down. NERVOUS WRECKS
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-BBnnTEQtR6U/VH8k8_U7g2I/AAAAAAAALRY/Qsr1VsFPNsc/s1600/nervous%2Bwrecks%2Bcover.jpg //4.bp.blogspot.com/-jSDaot7GGFI/VH8l4IJwvzI/AAAAAAAALRg/zOqy7J-ctPc/s1600/nervous%2Bwrecks%2Bspine.jpg

seo.title: Nervous Wrecks - Nervous Wrecks demo 2007 - Terminal Escape
